title: Salesman's Sample, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin and stem stitches with French knots on warp-float plain weave
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Salesman’s samples for embroidered waistcoats. Details include flowers, snails, a flowering branch with a bird's nest and feather worked in colored silk on white taffeta.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product
